Altus is a small town, so getting around isn't really a problem. The whole town can be toured by car, bicycle, or walking.
The main tourist attractions in Altus are the wineries.

While taking a tour of a winery, you might be given a chance at free wine tasting. Altus' wines are among the most exquisite in the world, so don't miss out on it.

Altus has very little accommodations, most of which are bed-and-breakfast inns.  Motels are available in Ozark, around 6 miles west, or in Clarksville, around 20 miles east.
